overview: Emily has worn costumes her entire life as Halloween was her father's favorite holiday. Her dad left Emily and her mom on Halloween. She believed if she wears them every day then maybe he will come back. Emily is forced to leave the home and find a job with the help of her best friend, Kit. Emily meets the manager at the thrift store, Jasmine, and immediately falls in love. Will this new love interest make Emily finally change her ways and get her out of those costumes?
tagline: When coming out of the thrift store isn't all you do.
title: The Out-Fit
